Metadata.title: Fesa - Formas Eficientes S.A. | Business Solutions in Panama
Metadata.description: Fesa - Over 50 years innovating in commercial printing, RFID solutions, payment methods and business technology in Panama. Security documents, forms and logistics solutions.

Footer.tagline: Over 50 years innovating in business solutions in Panama. Printing, RFID, payment methods and technology.

faqSection.title: Have questions?
faqSection.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services.

faqs.question: How long does it take to implement your solutions?
faqs.answer: Implementation time varies depending on project complexity. Standard solutions can be ready in 2-4 weeks, while customized projects may take 1-3 months. Our team works to minimize implementation time without compromising quality.

faqs.question: Do you offer technical support after implementation?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 technical support for all our clients. We have a dedicated team that can assist you by phone, email or WhatsApp. Additionally, we perform preventive maintenance to ensure optimal operation of your solutions.

faqs.question: Can you customize solutions according to my needs?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Every company is unique and we understand that. Our team of consultants analyzes your current processes and designs tailor-made solutions that perfectly adapt to your specific requirements.

faqs.question: What sectors do you serve?
faqs.answer: We serve companies across all sectors: banking, insurance, retail, manufacturing, government, healthcare, education, telecommunications, energy, logistics, construction and agribusiness. Our 50+ years of experience has allowed us to develop expertise in multiple industries.

faqs.question: What is the process to request a quote?
faqs.answer: You can contact us via WhatsApp, phone or email. One of our advisors will contact you to understand your needs, then we'll schedule a visit or virtual meeting to present you with a personalized proposal with no obligation.

PublicPrivacy.title: Privacy Notice
PublicPrivacy.subtitle: Learn how Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries protect and handle your personal data.
PublicPrivacy.q1Title: What does the Privacy Notice of Formas Eficientes and subsidiaries cover?
PublicPrivacy.q1Content: The Privacy Notice covers the purposes for which we request your personal data, the care we take in processing it, the rights you have as a personal data owner, and the channels we make available to exercise them. We present this Notice in compliance with the principles, rights, obligations, and procedures of Law 81 of 2019, its regulations, Agreement 1-2022 of the Superintendency of Banks of Panama on personal data protection, and the special regulations issued by the regulator of each sector.
PublicPrivacy.q2Title: Can the Privacy Notice of Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries be modified?
PublicPrivacy.q2Content: Yes, the Privacy Notice of Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries may be modified, updated, or supplemented from time to time, at the discretion of Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries, always in compliance with Law 81 of 2019 on personal data protection, as well as any other applicable law, agreement, or regulation, and will always be available, current, and updated on our websites.
PublicPrivacy.q3Title: Can my personal data be transferred?
PublicPrivacy.q3Content: For inquiries you wish to make about your personal data, you can contact Formas Eficientes, S.A. and/or subsidiaries, as applicable, through the following channels:
PublicPrivacy.q4Title: What uses can be given to my personal data?
PublicPrivacy.q4Content: At Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries, we collect, use, and process your personal data defined as data that identifies you or makes you identifiable (full name, ID, email, mobile phone, phone) for the purpose of offering you related products and services, with your prior consent or by virtue of compliance with contractual, legal, and/or regulatory obligations. By providing us with your personal data, we may use it for the following purposes by virtue of your consent, which you may revoke at any time:
PublicPrivacy.q4Use1: Marketing, Loyalty, Advertising, and Promotional Campaigns
PublicPrivacy.q4Use3: As well as any other use or communication related to the products and services offered by FESA and/or subsidiaries.
PublicPrivacy.q5Title: What rights do I have as a personal data owner?
PublicPrivacy.q5Content: These rights can be exercised through the attention channels indicated in question 3. Requests received based on these rights will be addressed in accordance with the exceptions contemplated in Law 81 of 2019. In order to provide greater security and prevent fraud, when exercising these rights you must comply with the security requirements of Formas Eficientes, S.A. and/or subsidiaries, as applicable, for verification and validation of your identity. As a personal data owner, you have 5 basic rights over your information:
PublicPrivacy.q5Right1Desc: Every personal data owner has the right to obtain their personal data stored or subject to processing in databases and to know the purpose and origin for which they were collected.
PublicPrivacy.q5Right2Desc: Every personal data owner has the right to request the correction of their personal data.
PublicPrivacy.q5Right3Desc: Every personal data owner has the right to request the deletion of their personal data.
PublicPrivacy.q5Right4Desc: Every personal data owner has the right to refuse to provide or revoke their consent for founded and legitimate reasons.
PublicPrivacy.q5Right5Desc: Every personal data owner has the right to obtain a copy of their personal data.
PublicPrivacy.q6Title: What are my obligations as a personal data owner?
PublicPrivacy.q6Content: As a personal data owner, you have the following obligations:
PublicPrivacy.q6Obligation2: Communicate any changes to said information to keep it updated.
PublicPrivacy.q6Obligation3: Keep your information secure, avoiding its misuse or unauthorized use.
PublicPrivacy.q6Footer: Formas Eficientes, S.A. and/or subsidiaries may carry out the procedures they deem necessary to validate your information, adopting the due diligence measures that correspond and in accordance with the provisions of Law 81 of 2019 and the regulations that develop it.
PublicPrivacy.q7Title: Can I request FESA and/or its subsidiaries to unsubscribe me from receiving certain information?
PublicPrivacy.q7Content: Yes, you may request to stop receiving certain institutional and/or promotional communications. This can be done through the channels we maintain at your disposal (see question 3), however, there is information and communications related to contractual, regulatory matters and/or that by virtue of Law are mandatory for Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries, and you cannot unsubscribe from these, meaning you must receive them to continue using certain products and/or services.
PublicPrivacy.q8Title: How will FESA and subsidiaries protect my personal data?
PublicPrivacy.q8Content: Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries have the following security mechanisms, among others:
PublicPrivacy.q8Measure1Desc: Our network is protected by firewalls that prevent unauthorized users from entering our network.
PublicPrivacy.q8Measure2Desc: Our servers have the latest antivirus updates.
PublicPrivacy.q8Measure3Desc: We have a patch update program that continuously checks for new vulnerabilities applicable to our environment. When a new update appears, we immediately proceed with proper testing and application.
PublicPrivacy.q9Title: Will my personal data be treated confidentially?
PublicPrivacy.q9Content: Yes, at FESA and subsidiaries, your personal data is treated confidentially. To this end, we implement various measures to guarantee the security, protection, and prevention of alteration, loss, unauthorized access, or processing of your personal data.
PublicPrivacy.q10Title: How long is my data retained?
PublicPrivacy.q10Content: Depending on the product or service you maintain with Formas Eficientes, S.A. and/or subsidiaries, the retention period of your personal data may vary. We will retain your personal data as long as the product and/or service you have contracted is active. In addition to this term, Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries are obligated to maintain and retain this information in accordance with applicable law for each sector, their regulations, applicable agreements, as well as their future modifications, and acting in compliance with Law 81 of 2019 and its developing regulations.
PublicPrivacy.q11Title: Can my personal data be transferred?
PublicPrivacy.q11Content: Your personal data will only be transferred to third parties, such as providers, advisors, auditors, accountants, domiciled in Panama or other jurisdictions, under the following conditions:
PublicPrivacy.q11Condition1: If we have your prior consent.
PublicPrivacy.q11Condition2: If necessary for the maintenance or fulfillment of the contract and provision of the contracted service.
PublicPrivacy.q11Condition4: Upon request from a competent authority.
PublicPrivacy.q12Title: Where can I access the Privacy Notice of Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries?
PublicPrivacy.q12Content: You may verify and consult, at any time, the latest version of the Privacy Notice of Formas Eficientes, S.A. and subsidiaries, which will always be available on the website www.fesa.com.pa and/or on the sites of its subsidiaries (see question 3).
PublicPrivacy.q13Title: What authority regulates personal data protection in Panama?
PublicPrivacy.q13Content: In Panama, the authority that regulates personal data protection at the national level is the National Authority for Transparency and Access to Information (ANTAI).
